member.name: ISyncMgrUIOperation.Run
member.summary: Performs the actual display of UI for a handler or sync item when requested to do so by Sync Center.
member.param: A handle to the window used to display the UI.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. Returns S_FALSE or another error code if this method is called to confirm an operation, such as activating a handler or disabling a sync item, but that operation should not be executed.

member.name: ISyncMgrUIOperation
member.summary: Exposes a method through which a sync handler or sync item can display a UI object when requested to do so by Sync Center.
